oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Generalized PT-Symmetric Sinh-Gordon Potential Solvable within Quantum Hamilton-Jacobi Formalism
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Yesiltas, Ozlem
Ocak, S. Bilge
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Quantum Physics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The generalized Sinh-Gordon potential is solved within quantum Hamiltonian Jacobi approach in the framework of PT symmetry. The quasi exact solutions of energy eigenvalues and eigenfunctions of the generalized Sinh-Gordon potential are found for n=0,1 states.
Comment: 10 pages appear to in IJTP
